mapper.insert: insert into news_operate_log ( CONTRIBUTION_ID, STATUS, OPETATE_DETAIL, OPETATE_TYPE, OPERATOR_ID) values (#{contributionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from news_operate_log where CONTRIBUTION_ID=#{id} order by OPERATE_TIME desc
